foragingBee
Interface IMovingAgent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMovingAgent, AbstractSphericAgent, Bee, FoodSource, Hive, HiveEntrance, Obstacle
public interface IMovingAgent

An interface for setting and retrieving information about a moving agent.

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)

Return the angle between this agent and the given agent.

Parameters:

Returns:
The angle in radians.

Parameters:

distance

double distance(IMovingAgent agent)
Return the distance to an other agent.

Parameters:
agent - The other agent.
Returns:
The distance.

distanceSquared

double distanceSquared(IMovingAgent agent)
Return the squared distance to an other agent. This method saves some execution time by not applying the square root so a squared distance is returned.

Parameters:
agent - The other agent.
Returns:
The squared distance.

turnBy

void turnBy(double angle)
Turn the agent by the given angle in degrees.

Parameters:
angle - The angle the agent will be turned by.

turnTo

void turnTo(double angle)
Turn the agent to the given angle given in degrees.

Parameters:
angle - The angle the agent will be turned to.

vectorTo

javax.vecmath.Vector3d vectorTo(IMovingAgent agent)
Calculate the vector from this agent to the provided one.

Parameters:
agent - The other the computed vector will head to.
Returns:
The vector heading to the other agent.

getLocation

javax.vecmath.Point3d getLocation()
Return the reference to the agent's location.

Returns:
The reference to the agents location as Point3d.

                 double y,
                 double z)
Set the location of this agent.

Parameters:
x - The x value on the x-axis.
y - The y value on the y-axis.
z - The z value on the z-axis.

setLocation

Set the location of this agent.

Parameters:
location - The location of this agent.

getSphereRadius

double getSphereRadius()
Return the radius of the surrounding sphere of the agent. The sphere is similar to a bounding box but a sphere.

Returns:
The sphere the agent fills in.

getVelocityVector

javax.vecmath.Vector3d getVelocityVector()
Returns the vector with the velocity.

Returns:
The current velocity vector of the agent.

Set the velocity vector to a speed meaning setting the vector to a given length.

Parameters:
speed -

                       double y,

Set the velocity vector.

Parameters:

setVelocityVector

void setVelocityVector(javax.vecmath.Vector3d v)
Copies the field of the input vector in to current velocity vector.

Parameters:
v - The new velocity vector.
